title: Earmonium provides royalty free sound effects and music especially for video games and apps
text: Earmonium provides royalty free sound effects and music especially for video games and apps September 21, 2015 -- Earmonium offers a variety of sound effects and music for games, apps and video without any royalty. A number of other websites are available on the internet which provides free music or sfx files but Earmonium keeps its focus on video games to provide royalty free music and sound effects for games. With the advancement of technology and amazingly evolving graphics of the video games the need for good quality sound effects or background music has also emerged, for which websites like Earmonium are a great option. The website offers well categorized audio files and royalty free music for games which makes browsing easy. The sound effects for games are available in high resolution and superior quality with a configuration up to 192 Khz/24 bit and even 5.1 surround. The user will only have to pay once for these sound effects and can be used forever by them. The instant download option after the purchase also makes it convenient for the user to immediately own the audio file and use it further. The sound effects are promised to be of Hollywood standards while the vast libraries are created by some of the best sound design companies and composers in the world and selected by a team of professionals from Earmonium. The sound effects offered by Earmonium are not only suitable for video games but can also be used for other projects by sound designers and video producers.The high quality and interesting sound effects can put life to any game, mobile app or video projects and that is why a number of major companies such as Activision, Bethesda, EA Games, SEGA, Sony, Ubisoft, Warner Brosare using the royalty free sound effects offered by Earmonium. The high quality audio files and sound effects are suitable for both personal and commercial projects. The simple search options let the user find exactly what they are looking for. The user can narrow down the search based on following categories like: Genre, Instruments, Mood and Tempo to find the suitable music piece for their project. The website can be a great boon for people working on sound and video projects such as composers, app developers and even students. Media Contact
